subject: Supreme Court of the United St
body:
Supreme Court of the United States
1 First St NE, Washington, DC 20543, USA
Attn: Beneficiary
After proper and several investigations by the Western Union, Money
Gram, International Monetary Fund (IMF) and United Nations (UN)
Offices we found your name amongst those that have sent money through
Western Union, Cash App, Zelle, Venmo, Bank Transfer/Deposit and Money
Gram in the course of receiving your Inheritance, Lottery, United
Nation compensation funds which proves that you have truly been
swindled by those unscrupulous persons by sending money to them
through the above mentioned means.
To this regard United Nations (UN) held a meeting with the Board of
Directors of WESTERN UNION, MONEYGRAM, INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND
(IMF) the FBI alongside with the MINISTRY of FINANCE. As a result of
our investigations it was agreed that your unpaid Funds sum of
$25,000,000.00 should be released to you from the funds set aside by
The United States Department of the Treasury to compensate scam
victims.
The compensation scheme is open to people who wired money to scammers
via Western Union and MoneyGram between January 1, 2008 to December
19, 2021, the deadline for lodging these claims is December 30, 2023.
This case is being handled and supervised by the (FBI-IMF) therefore
we have submitted your details to the paying delegate in charge to
affect the transfer or delivery of your funds. 
The only fee you will
pay is $90 usd only by Gift Card such as a Steam Wallet or Apple Store
Card of $90 usd.
Sincerely
Sir chiefj Joshua
Email: 
lawrencehappiness2020@gmail.com
From the Department of the Supreme Court of Justice.

subject: Re: Supreme Court of the United St
body:
Hello Sir Chief Joshua,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information. It's quite surprising to hear about the situation. I must admit, I'm a bit confused about some parts of your message.

Could you please clarify how my name ended up on the list of people who have sent money through Western Union, Cash App, Zelle, Venmo, Bank Transfer Deposit and Money Gram? I don't recall participating in any lottery or sending money through these platforms.

Also, could you explain more about the compensation scheme from The United States Department of the Treasury? How was it decided that victims should be compensated with funds set aside by them?

Lastly, regarding the fee payment via Gift Card such as Steam Wallet or Apple Store Card - could you provide more details on why this specific method is chosen for payment?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Brittany

subject: Re: Supreme Court of the United St
Re: Supreme Court of the United St
body:
Hello there,

I hope you're having a great day! I'm really interested in learning more about what you have to offer. Could you please provide me with some more details? I'm all ears and ready to understand better. 

Just a quick note, I'd prefer not to share any personal information at this stage. Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Brittany

subject: Re: Supreme Court of the United St
body:
Hello there! I hope you're having a great day. I'm really interested in learning more about what you have to share. Could you please provide some more details?

Best wishes,
Brittany
